description: Professor Anthony King (University of Exeter) looks at the modern infantry tactics and cohesion, with a perspective on conscripted vs. professional armies.
itunes:subtitle: Professor Anthony King (University of Exeter) looks at the modern infantry tactics and cohesion, with a perspective on conscripted vs. professional armies.

title: The Combat Soldier: Infantry Tactics and Cohesion in the Twentieth and Twenty-first Centuries
